Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class School

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.School
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class School extends Object implements Serializable
The school is one of the "physical" elements of the game. It is divided in three parts: the Hall, the dining room (with a Table for each Color), and the TowerRoom. Each Player has one, and it is perhaps the most crucial element of the game.
See Also:

    • getHall

      public Hall getHall()

    • getTable

      public Table getTable(String color) throws NonExistentColorException
      Returns the table of the given color between the ones in the school, if present.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the desired table.
      Returns:
      the table of the desired color from the school.
      Throws:
      NonExistentColorException - if a non-existent color is somehow provided (client-side controls should prevent this, so it should never be thrown).

    • getTowerRoom

      public TowerRoom getTowerRoom()
      Returns the school's TowerRoom.
      Returns:
      the school's TowerRoom.

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public void moveStudentToIsland(Island island, String color) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Actually removes a student of the given color from the Hall and puts it onto the given Island, if possible.
      Parameters:
      island - the Island to move the student to.
      color - the color of the student to move.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if a student of the given color does not currently exist in the school's Hall.

    • moveStudentToTable

      public void moveStudentToTable(Player player, String color) throws StudentNotFoundException, NonExistentColorException, FullTableException
      Actually removes a student of the given color from the Hall and places it at the proper school's Table, if possible.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose coins' wallet may be updated.
      color - the color of the student to move.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if a student of the given color does not currently exist in the school's Hall.
      NonExistentColorException - if a non-existent color is somehow provided (client-side controls should prevent this, so it should never be thrown).
      FullTableException - if the table of the given color present in the school is currently full.
